00032 #ifndef IPIPESEGMENT_H
00033 #define IPIPESEGMENT_H
00034 
00035 #include "IPipeSegmentBase.h"
00036 
00037 namespace PipeLineProcessing
00038 {
00039 template<class OutputPipeType>
00040 class IPipeSegment : public virtual PipeLineProcessing::IPipeSegmentBase
00041 {
00042 protected:
00043 
00044         /*  The following static data-members are included to force the user(s) of this
00045          *  class to adhere to the following rule:
00046          *              ALL PIPE SEGMENTS MUST IMPLEMENT THE IPIPESEGMENTBASE INTERFACE
00047          *  This method of compile-time detection of illegal template parameter types
00048          *  was pilfered from the following article/website:
00049          *              http://www.accu-usa.org/2000-09.html
00050         */
00051         const static IPipeSegmentBase* const OutputPipeType_Substitutable;              //examine the end of this file for details
00052         const static unsigned int OutputPipeType_Not_Void = (unsigned int)sizeof(OutputPipeType); //illegal if OutputPipeSegmentType is void
00053 
00054         //These methods are inherited from the IPipeSegmentBase interface
00055         virtual bool addOutputHandler(IPipeSegmentBase *output)=0;
00056         virtual bool removeOutputHandler(IPipeSegmentBase *output)=0;
00057         virtual bool removeAllOutputHandlers()=0;
00058 
00059 public:
00060 
00061         virtual IPipeSegment<OutputPipeType> *connectTo(OutputPipeType *output)=0;
00062         virtual IPipeSegment<OutputPipeType> *disconnectFrom(OutputPipeType *output)=0;
00063         virtual void disconnectFromAll()=0;
00064 
00065         virtual void operator+=(OutputPipeType *output)=0;
00066         virtual void operator-=(OutputPipeType *output)=0;
00067 
00068         virtual void operator+=(OutputPipeType &output)=0;
00069         virtual void operator-=(OutputPipeType &output)=0;
00070 
00071         virtual ~IPipeSegment() {};
00072 };
00073 
00074 //This line does a compile-time check that the OutputPipeType template parameter
00075 //is an IPipeSegmentBase type.  It performs this check by attempting to cast a pointer
00076 //to an OutputPipeType as a pointer to an IPipeSegmentBase.  If you are very
00077 //clever you will realize that this would not fail with an OutputPipeType template
00078 //parameter of 'void'.  This is checked inline by the OutputPipeType_Not_Void static
00079 //data member in the IPipeSegment class header file (above).
00080 template<class OutputPipeType>
00081 const IPipeSegmentBase* const IPipeSegment<OutputPipeType>::OutputPipeType_Substitutable = (const OutputPipeType*) 0;
00082 
00083 }
00084 
00085 #endif /*IPIPESEGMENT_H*/
